tool_description: A simple SMS api for sending messages all over the world. Find out more at www.rapidapisms.com
name: Rapid SMS API
title: Rapid SMS API

api_list.name: Test our service
api_list.description: An endpoint which test the service
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rapid-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com/service-status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapid-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rapid-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com/service-status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapid-sms-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
